addons.name: English (South African) Language Pack
addons.description: Adds South African English language support to the Firefox browser. All interfaces will be translated into South African English.
addons.fullDescription:
Translation of the Firefox user interface into South African English by http://translate.org.za.

If you find missing translations or incorrect translations then visit http://pootle.translate.org.za and please contribute a correction.

addons.name: English (CA) Language Pack
addons.description: Language pack for Firefox for en-CA

addons.name: Full Web Page Screenshots (♥♥♥♥♥)
addons.description:
FireShot makes full web page screenshots. Demo: http://bit.ly/RlBQMV

Screenshots can be quickly captured and:

― Saved as Image or PDF with links
― Sent to clipboard
― Printed
― Annotated *
― Uploaded *
― E-Mailed *

* OS Windows only
addons.fullDescription:
If you like FireShot, please consider trying the FireShot Pro version.
https://getfireshot.com/

FireShot Pro - Capture + Annotate Full Webpage Screenshots captures entirely, edits and saves your webpages.

The newest FireShot Pro Full Webpage Screenshot version supports even early betas up to Firefox 76 and it is available for downloading from FireShot: Full Webpage Screenshots + Annotations home.

Chrome version: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/capture-webpage-screensho/mcbpblocgmgfnpjjppndjkmgjaogfceg

Firefox, Chrome, Internet Explorer, Pale Moon, and Opera support: https://getfireshot.com

The FireShot Pro Full Webpage Screenshot edition adds features such as:

* Printing screenshot
* Saving screenshots to single-page or multi-page PDFs with hyperlinks
* Capturing all tabs to single PDF
* Creating PDFs from selected captures from the Editor
* Export to OneNote [new]
* Capturing all tabs in one click
* Advanced Editor
* Crop and Resize screenshot functionality
* Undo/Redo
* Clipboard
* Uploading screenshots to custom HTTP or FTP servers
* Work with projects
* Better support for the e-mail messengers (GMail, Outlook.com, Yahoo, etc)

FireShot Pro Full Webpage Screenshot is available for Firefox, Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Seamonkey and Thunderbird. You can get it here: https://getfireshot.com/buy.php

Read more about FireShot Pro Full Webpage Screenshot: Full Webpage Screenshots in Firefox

If you want, you can enable Advanced features from the FireShot's menu. This will require downloading and running the Native Messaging package. This is the only method, officially approved by Mozilla (read more: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/Native_messaging).

Follow us on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/WebpageCapture

screenshots.caption: Full web page screenshots, capture to image or PDF.
Adding comments to screenshots is as easy as 1-2-3. Perfect tool for designers and QA.
It's easy to add a custom text in FireShot Webpage Screenshot
Editing screenshot in the built-in Editor

addons.name: JSONView
addons.description: View JSON documents in the browser.
addons.fullDescription:
Normally when encountering a JSON document (content type "application/json"), Firefox simply prompts you to download the file. With the JSONView extension, JSON documents are shown in the browser similar to how XML documents are shown. The document is formatted, highlighted, and arrays and objects can be collapsed. Even if the JSON document contains errors, JSONView will still show the raw text.
Once you've got JSONView installed, check out http://jsonview.com/example.json to see the extension in action!
